title: Night Vision Skob Watch Face
summary: Watch Face for Smart watch. Military chronograph with night mode
description: Skob is a stylish watch face for your Android Wear device. This watch face features a special night mode design for ultimate readability in low light situations.This analog watchface will make your Android Wear device even more iconic:★ Military watch with special night mode★ Possibility to choose color scheme★ Adventurous spirit and exclusive design★ Exttra functions in small dials ★ Works for round and squared watchesSupports 6 languages for day of the week:RussianenglishGermanFrenchItalianChineseDesigned by Alexander Skobeltsyn.http://watchface.su/
descriptionHTML:
Skob is a stylish watch face for your Android Wear device.
This watch face features a special night mode design for ultimate readability in low light situations.

This analog watchface will make your Android Wear device even more iconic:
★ Military watch with special night mode
★ Possibility to choose color scheme
★ Adventurous spirit and exclusive design
★ Exttra functions in small dials
★ Works for round and squared watches

Supports 6 languages for day of the week:
Russian
english
German
French
Italian
Chinese

Designed by Alexander Skobeltsyn.
http://watchface.su/
comments: Blue is different in Night mode The circles around the date, date, and time/battery indicators are a little bit different. When my Galaxy Gear goes into standy-ish mode, it will use less pixels, colors, etc, and therefor the circles will turn blue. Can you check if ALL the colors in the blue mode are exactly the same. Please change the small circles to the outer stripes color. The light blue gives less strain on the eyes and looks better than the small circle blue (in standby-ish mode). If you give me an email address I can send photos.

Not worth a dime, over advertised! Wish I had checked the look of this one before the 15 min timer ran out. Hands are very pixelated on the moto and the color options and night mode do not exist whatsoever! Nothing like what is advertised here.

Really nice but has faults This is truly a nice watch face but the day in the day/date has errors Eg Sun 26 April was showing as Sat 26 of April Also Wednesday is 2 WED not WEN. Dev does not respond to bug reports
Nice need square watch face Nice look great hope to have redesign in square watch face
